attributes.action: Instruct the Scottish Legal Aid Board to review cases where the pursuer drops a case just before going to court for a full hearing with a view to either claiming back all wasted public monies from the pursuer or taking legal action against the pursuer for wasting public money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created because of a recent case where the Scottish Legal Aid Board issued a legal aid certificate to a person who was only bringing the action out of spite. The problem is that the defender is now in financial difficulties as a result of this action and seems to have no recourse against the situation.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
